LanguageData.MirotofinilTolerance.label: Mirotofinil tolerance
LanguageData.MirotofinilTolerance.description: Analeptic, used to treat drowsiness associated with narcolepsy. Used for a long time in medicine. Significantly reduces sleep time, which, however, is not without consequences. It is highly addictive.
LanguageData.MirotofinilHediff.label: psychosuppression
LanguageData.MirotofinilHediff.description: Analeptic, used to treat drowsiness associated with narcolepsy. Used for a long time in medicine. Significantly reduces sleep time, which, however, is not without consequences. It is highly addictive.
LanguageData.MirotofinilAddiction.label: Mirotofinil addiction
LanguageData.MirotofinilAddiction.description: Analeptic, used to treat drowsiness associated with narcolepsy. Used for a long time in medicine. Significantly reduces sleep time, which, however, is not without consequences. It is highly addictive.
LanguageData.MirotofinilAddiction.stages.1.label: withdrawal
